languages.text: "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан... Я хотела сказать... Эм... Ваши слуги проделали великолепную работу, оборудовав эти покои под мои нужды и вкус!" {n}Кроткая улыбка касается бледных губ.{/n} "Если позволите, я бы хотела передохнуть после тяжелого дня. А вы... мы... увидимся завтра".

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан, не желаете ли осмотреться? Ваши слуги проделали великолепную работу, оборудовав Санктум Навис под мои нужды и вкус". {n}Кроткая улыбка касается бледных губ.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан... Я хотела сказать... Эм... Ваши слуги проделали великолепную работу, оборудовав эти покои под мои нужды и вкус!" {n}Кроткая улыбка касается бледных губ.{/n} "Если позволите, я бы хотела передохнуть после тяжелого дня. А вы... мы... увидимся завтра".

traits.locale_text: "In that case, Lord Captain, would you wish to have a look around? Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adjust the Sanctum Navis to my needs and tastes." {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "In that case, Lord Captain, would you wish to have a look around? Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adjust the Sanctum Navis to my needs and tastes." {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n}

And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “其实，舰长大人……我想说的是……嗯……你的仆人竭尽所能地将我的房间改造成我最需要、最喜欢的样子，真是辛苦他们了！”{n}卡西娅苍白的嘴唇上露出一抹温柔的笑意。{/n}“我今天有些累了，如果可以的话，我想早点回房休息。你……我们，我们明天见。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: “其实，舰长大人……我想说的是……嗯……你的仆人竭尽所能地将我的房间改造成我最需要、最喜欢的样子，真是辛苦他们了！”{n}卡西娅苍白的嘴唇上露出一抹温柔的笑意。{/n}“我今天有些累了，如果可以的话，我想早点回房休息。你……我们，我们明天见。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn das so ist, Lord Captain ... Was ich sagen will, ist ... ähm ... Eure Diener haben bei ihren Bemühungen, diese Gemächer an meine Bedürfnisse und meinen Geschmack anzupassen, ganz wunderbare Arbeit geleistet!" {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln berührt ihre fahlen Lippen.{/n} "Wenn es recht ist, würde ich mich nach einem anstrengenden Tag gerne zurückziehen. Und Ihr ... wir ... wir sehen uns morgen."
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das so ist, Lord Captain ... Was ich sagen will, ist ... ähm ... Eure Diener haben bei ihren Bemühungen, diese Gemächer an meine Bedürfnisse und meinen Geschmack anzupassen, ganz wunderbare Arbeit geleistet!" {n}Ein schwaches Lächeln berührt ihre fahlen Lippen.{/n} "Wenn es recht ist, würde ich mich nach einem anstrengenden Tag gerne zurückziehen. Und Ihr ... wir ... wir sehen uns morgen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Ce que je veux dire, c'est que... euh... Vos serviteurs ont fait de l'excellent travail pour adapter ces appartements à mes goûts et mes besoins ! » {n}Ses lèvres pâles esquissent un sourire.{/n} « La journée a été rude, alors, si vous le permettez, j'aimerais me retirer. Et vous... nous... nous nous verrons demain. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Ce que je veux dire, c'est que... euh... Vos serviteurs ont fait de l'excellent travail pour adapter ces appartements à mes goûts et mes besoins ! » {n}Ses lèvres pâles esquissent un sourire.{/n} « La journée a été rude, alors, si vous le permettez, j'aimerais me retirer. Et vous... nous... nous nous verrons demain. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «En ese caso, Lord Capitán... Lo que quiero decir es... Mm... ¡Sus sirvientes han hecho maravillosos esfuerzos para adaptar estos aposentos a mis necesidades y gustos!». {n}Una sonrisa mansa aparece en sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Si me permite, me gustaría retirarme después de un arduo día. Y usted... Nosotros... nos veremos mañana».
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, Lord Capitán... Lo que quiero decir es... Mm... ¡Sus sirvientes han hecho maravillosos esfuerzos para adaptar estos aposentos a mis necesidades y gustos!». {n}Una sonrisa mansa aparece en sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Si me permite, me gustaría retirarme después de un arduo día. Y usted... Nosotros... nos veremos mañana».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この場合、ロード・キャプテン…あたくしが言いたかったのは…その…あなたの使用人は、素晴らしい努力で、この部屋をあたくしの求めるものや趣味に合わせてくださったということです！」{n}柔和な微笑みが彼女の淡い色の唇を彩る。{/n}「もしもよろしければ、大変だった今日はこれで失礼させていただきたいと思います。そして、あなたと…あたくしたちは…あたくしたちは、また明日お会いすることにしましょう」
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."

traits.locale_text: 「この場合、ロード・キャプテン…あたくしが言いたかったのは…その…あなたの使用人は、素晴らしい努力で、この部屋をあたくしの求めるものや趣味に合わせてくださったということです！」{n}柔和な微笑みが彼女の淡い色の唇を彩る。{/n}「もしもよろしければ、大変だった今日はこれで失礼させていただきたいと思います。そして、あなたと…あたくしたちは…あたくしたちは、また明日お会いすることにしましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Madem öyle Lord Kaptan... Demek istediğim şey... Şey... Hizmetkârların, bu odaları bana uygun hâle getirmek için muazzam çaba sarf etti!" {n}Soluk dudaklarında cılız bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Müsaade edersen bu yorucu günün ardından istirahate çekilmek isterim. Seni de... Biz... Yarın görüşeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "In that case, Lord Captain... What I mean to say is... um... Your servants have done marvellously in their efforts to adapt these chambers to my needs and tastes!" {n}A meek smile touches her pale lips.{/n} "If I may, I would like to retire after an arduous day. And you... we... we shall see each other tomorrow."
